Description: 
------------- 
After a simple job goes wrong, Kane and Lynch are searched the Shanghai underworld. Lynch is living the good life as a man of confidence in Shanghai, where he has established with his girlfriend. Is involved in a major arms deal, but need help to make it happen. Kane is a tramp, a former mercenary with family problems that need to get away. Despite their differences, Lynch called for help. Once together, the compensation of a chain of events over two days, the agreement falls apart and Kane and Lynch face the consequences the hard way. 

Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days is a shooting game raw and brutal crime designed for players at an even more intense story, after two of the most disturbed criminals in the game, through the harsh underworld of Shanghai. The introduction of a new visual experience, Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days is inspired by the documentary film and was generated by the user. Every aspect of the game has been designed to offer a fresh perspective to the 'intensity' and 'realism' in videogames.
